attributes.action: change the rules on where proceeds from speeding fines go
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: police forces across the country state speeding fines are not a means of making money, they can easilly show this by giving all proceeds to charity helping charities such as cancer research/ lifeboat etc to raise much needed finance and showing the british public that fines are not a means of raising capital, this would give a masive boost to the police versus motorist feeling, boosting the popularity of both the police and the government at no cost
